name: best
description: A project to store and classify scientific data
author: sb

scripts.build:win-x64: quasar build -m electron --target win32 --arch x64 && npm run package:win-x64
scripts.build:mac-arm64: quasar build -m electron --target darwin --arch arm64 && npm run package:mac-arm64
scripts.package:win-x64: mkdir -p dist/builds && cd dist/electron/Packaged && zip -r "../../builds/best-win-x64-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S).zip" "Best - Scientific DB Manager-win32-x64"
scripts.package:mac-arm64: mkdir -p dist/builds && cd dist/electron/Packaged && if command -v hdiutil >/dev/null 2>&1; then hdiutil create -volname "Best - Scientific DB Manager" -srcfolder "Best - Scientific DB Manager-darwin-arm64" -ov -format UDZO "../../builds/best-mac-arm64-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S).dmg"; else tar -czf "../../builds/best-mac-arm64-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S).tar.gz" "Best - Scientific DB Manager-darwin-arm64"; fi
